name: CORE DEFENSE (Lev_Seidman)
description:
Core Defense is a fun and interesting top down shooter. Protect the core from enemies who shoot and dash towards their target. Play by your self or with a friend beside you in the two player mode. Try and beat your highscore by trying out new moves and strategies. This game is free so why not give it a try??

This game was made during the Secret Santa Game Jam 2020.

It would be very helpful if you completed the feedback form!

Single player controls: 

W,A,S,D for movement, mouse to shoot and look.

Two player controls:

Player 1 (green) W,A,S,D

Player 2 (blue) Arrow Keys and mouse to shoot and look

Escape to go to main menu.
